typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		TARGET_SYS_ID as string,
		TARGET_TABLE_ID as string,
		SOURCE_SYS_ID as string,
		SOURCE_TABLE_ID as string,
		SEQ_NO as integer,
		LAST_READ_TIME as timestamp,
		CUR_READ_TIME as timestamp,
		ETL_METHOD as string,
		ETL_STATUS as string,
		LOAD_MODE as string,
		LOCK_TIME as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'etl',
	folderPath: 'tableregister') ~> sourceregister
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'etl',
	folderPath: 'etl_log') ~> sourceetllog
sourceregister sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1
sourceetllog sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink2
